content:
Create and Apply FlexCard Elements Custom CSS

Create custom CSS classes from a code editor inside the designer, and apply them to supported fields. Or, add inline styles to a specific element.

FlexCards Custom CSS Properties

Custom CSS properties are configurable from the Style panel in the FlexCard Designer when you select an element. When the design interfaces don't meet your needs, apply a class or add inline styles.

Create Custom CSS Within the FlexCard Designer

Create custom CSS classes within the designer to apply to elements or supported fields inside elements.

Apply Custom CSS to a FlexCard Element

Add custom CSS to edit internal components of an element or child element when design interfaces don't meet your needs. Use this feature sparingly to optimize performance.

Add Inline Styles to a FlexCard Element

Add inline CSS styles to an element on a FlexCard when styling options don't meet your needs. Override classes and target specific elements or component parts.

Create a Custom Style for a FlexCard Element

Display Records Side-By-Side on a FlexCard

Arrange, Duplicate, and Remove Elements on a FlexCard

Pass Concatenated Strings As Values in FlexCards

Set a Private Variable at Runtime in a FlexCard
title: Customizing FlexCards with CSS in OmniStudio
